Serialized Form

  • Package photopack

    • Class photopack.Album

      class Album extends Object implements Serializable
      serialVersionUID:
      1L

      • Serialized Fields

        • album
          ArrayList<Photo> album
          The private instance variable "album" is an ArrayList of Photo objects representing the collection of photos stored in an Album.
        • name
          String name
          The private instance variable "name" is an String representing the name of an Album.

    • Class photopack.Photo

      class Photo extends Object implements Serializable
      serialVersionUID:
      1L

      • Serialized Fields

        • caption
          String caption
          A String representing the caption/description of the photo.
        • date
          Calendar date
          A Calendar object representing the date/time when the photo was taken.
        • path
          String path
          A String representing the file path of the photo on the local file system.
        • tags
          Map<String,List<String>> tags
          A Map object representing the tags associated with the photo. The keys of the map represent the tag types and the values represent the tag values

    • Class photopack.SerializableImage

      class SerializableImage extends Object implements Serializable

      • Serialization Methods

        • readObject
          private void readObject(ObjectInputStream in) throws IOException, ClassNotFoundException
          Deserializes the wrapped image from an input stream using the default object serialization protocol.
          Parameters:
          in - the input stream from which the image will be deserialized.
          Throws:
          IOException - if there is an error while reading from the input stream.
          ClassNotFoundException - if the class of the serialized object cannot be found.
        • writeObject
          private void writeObject(ObjectOutputStream out) throws IOException
          Custom serialization method to write the object to a stream. The method first calls the defaultWriteObject method from the ObjectOutputStream class. Then it writes the image data to the output stream in PNG format using the ImageIO class.
          Parameters:
          out - the output stream to write the object to
          Throws:
          IOException - if an I/O error occurs while writing to the stream

    • Class photopack.User

      class User extends Object implements Serializable
      serialVersionUID:
      1L

      • Serialized Fields

        • albums
          ArrayList<Album> albums
          The ArrayList of Album objects created by the User object
        • username
          String username
          The username of the User object

    • Class photopack.UserApp

      class UserApp extends Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • users
          ArrayList<User> users
          An ArrayList representing the list of users in the application. This private variable is used to store the list of User objects in the application. It is initialized as an empty ArrayList and can only be accessed and modified within the UserApp class.
